topic.title: Sample Code
topic.shortdesc: The Java SDK supports creation and handling of extended attributes.

section.title: Subdocument Operations and Extended Attributes
section.p: A high-level summary of extended attributes can be found in Extended Attributes. Extended attributes are handled by means of extensions to the Subdocument API.

section.title: Java Extended Attributes Example
section.p: The following code demonstrates how extended attributes be used. It assumes that Couchbase Server is established on localhost; that the Full Administrator username and password are Administrator and password respectively; and that the travel-sample bucket is installed. For information on installing the travel-sample bucket, see Install Sample Buckets.
